title: 009 - John Branyan - Flying Kites, Cones of Dunshire, and Donald Trump's Brother
description:
Oh boy! It's time for another Poddy Break. John's dad dials a telephone and flies a kite, while Tim accuses Ted Cruz of eating off brand cereal. Caleb is relieved of his title as Water Expert, and Tim zip-a-dee-doo-dahs himself into an electric scooter.
 Also in this episode: "Who invented the microwave?" and "A Day at the Pigeon Factory".
 Hit us up on twitter @poddybreak
 Visit John's interwebs homepage
 John's on twitter @john_branyan
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: Make Cereal Great Again!
